io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.util

クラス Raypath

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.util.Raypath

  • public class Raypath
extends java.lang.Object
    Raypath between a source at sourceLocation and a receiver at stationPosition
    This class is IMMUTABLE

    • フィールドのサマリー

      source-to-receiver(station) Azimuth [rad] 震源から観測点をみた方位角
      protected double backAzimuth 
      protected double epicentralDistance
      epicentral distance [rad]

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • Raypath

        public Raypath(Location source,
               HorizontalPosition station)
        Create a raypath for the source and station.
        パラメータ:
        source - Location of a source
        station - HorizontalPosition of a station

      • Raypath

        public Raypath(SACHeaderData sacHeaderData)
        Create a raypath for the input SAC.
        パラメータ:
        sacHeaderData - of a raypath to create

      • Raypath

        public Raypath(BasicID basicID)
        Create a raypath for an input id
        パラメータ:
        basicID - of a raypath to create

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getSource

        public Location getSource()
        戻り値:
        Location of the seismic source on the raypath

      • getStation

        public HorizontalPosition getStation()
        戻り値:
        HorizontalPosition of the seismic station on the raypath

      • getEpicentralDistance

        public double getEpicentralDistance()
        戻り値:
        epicentral distance of this raypath [rad]

      • getAzimuth

        public double getAzimuth()
        戻り値:
        azimuth [rad]

      • getBackAzimuth

        public double getBackAzimuth()
        戻り値:
        back azimuth [rad]

      • positionOnRaypathAt

        public HorizontalPosition positionOnRaypathAt(double theta)
        パラメータ:
        theta - [rad]
        戻り値:
        HorizontalPosition on the raypath which has epicentral distance of theta from the source. 震源から観測点に向けての震央距離thetaでの座標

      • moveToNorthPole

        public HorizontalPosition moveToNorthPole(HorizontalPosition position)
        ある点を震源、観測点に与えた時に、 震源を北極に持って行って観測点をさらに標準時線に持っていった時のある点の座標
        パラメータ:
        position - HorizontalPosition of target
        戻り値:
        relative position when the source is shifted to the north pole and station is on the Standard meridian

      • moveFromNorthPole

        public HorizontalPosition moveFromNorthPole(HorizontalPosition position)
        震源を北極に持って行って観測点をさらに標準時線に持っていった時に、ある点を仮定する。 その後震源、観測点を本来の位置に戻した時の、ある点の座標
        パラメータ:
        position - HorizontalPosition of target
        戻り値:
        relative position when the source is shifted from the north pole and station is from the Standard meridian

      • computeCompensatedEpicentralDistance

        public double computeCompensatedEpicentralDistance(Phase phase,
                                                   VelocityStructure structure)
        Compensation is the raypath extension of the input phase to the surface at the source side.
        パラメータ:
        phase - target phase to be extended
        structure - in which a raypath travels
        戻り値:
        [rad] the delta of the extednded ray path

      • toANISOtime

        public Raypath[] toANISOtime(Phase phase,
                             VelocityStructure structure)
        パラメータ:
        phase - target phase
        structure - to compute raypath
        戻り値:
        Raypath which phase travels this raypath
